vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrancy_secure.withdrawBalance (patch_7.sol#7-19):
	External calls:
	- success = msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)() (patch_7.sol#15)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_7.sol#18)
